trans-unit.source: The type of value returned by the expression.
trans-unit.target: 運算式所傳回之值的型別。

trans-unit.source: Represents a lambda expression used as an l-value, which supports binding of <see cref="F:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection.Out" /> arguments.
trans-unit.target: 代表用來當做左值 (l-value) 的 Lambda 運算式，可支援 <see cref="F:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection.Out" /> 引數的繫結。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> is used for lambda expressions specified in code and cannot be serialized to XAML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 會用來當做程式碼中指定的 Lambda 運算式，不可序列化為 XAML。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt to serialize a workflow that contains a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> is made, a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試序列化包含 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 的工作流程，會擲回 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the containing workflow requires XAML serialization, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> or use <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> to convert the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> to a format that can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含的工作流程需要 XAML 序列化，請使用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> 或 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> 將 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 轉換成可以序列化的格式。

trans-unit.source: This activity uses the LINQ to Entity provider to evaluate LINQ expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個活動會評估 LINQ 運算式中使用 LINQ to 實體提供者。

trans-unit.source: Any LINQ expressions used with this activity must be evaluatable by the ADO.Net Entity Data Model.
trans-unit.target: 任何使用此活動的 LINQ 運算式必須評估 ADO.Net 實體資料模型。

trans-unit.source: For example, LINQ expressions cannot be used to reference activities, variables, or arguments of the workflow itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，LINQ 運算式無法用來參考活動、 變數或引數的工作流程本身。

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用於轉換的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <see langword="true" /> and is used in conjunction with <see cref="M:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1.ConvertToString(System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext)" /> to provide descriptive error messages when an attempt is made to serialize this activity to XAML.
trans-unit.target: 此方法一律傳回 <see langword="true" />，而且當嘗試將此活動序列化為 XAML 時，會與 <see cref="M:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1.ConvertToString(System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext)" /> 搭配使用以提供描述性的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> is used for lambda expressions specified in code and cannot be serialized to XAML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 會用來當做程式碼中指定的 Lambda 運算式，不可序列化為 XAML。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt to serialize a workflow that contains a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> is made, a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試序列化包含 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 的工作流程，會擲回 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the containing workflow requires XAML serialization, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> or use <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> to convert the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> to a format that can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含的工作流程需要 XAML 序列化，請使用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> 或 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> 將 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 轉換成可以序列化的格式。

trans-unit.source: The context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用於轉換的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> and is used in conjunction with <see cref="M:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1.CanConvertToString(System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext)" /> to provide descriptive error messages when an attempt is made to serialize this activity to XAML.
trans-unit.target: 擲回 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" />，而且當嘗試將此活動序列化為 XAML 時，會與 <see cref="M:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1.CanConvertToString(System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext)" /> 搭配使用以提供描述性的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: This method throws a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> when called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> is used for lambda expressions specified in code and cannot be serialized to XAML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 會用來當做程式碼中指定的 Lambda 運算式，不可序列化為 XAML。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt to serialize a workflow that contains a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> is made, a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試序列化包含 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 的工作流程，會擲回 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the containing workflow requires XAML serialization, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> or use <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> to convert the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> to a format that can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含的工作流程需要 XAML 序列化，請使用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> 或 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> 將 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 轉換成可以序列化的格式。
